alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 7:17PM CDT until June 07 at 6:16AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Hastings NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Bow Creek Near Stockton affecting Phillips and Rooks Counties. South Fork Solomon River Near Woodston affecting Osborne and Rooks Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Solomon River Near Woodston. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding occurs on both sides of the channel. Flood waters affect agricultural areas adjacent to the river and will begin to flow over the bridge on 30 Road located 2 miles downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:46 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 14.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.2 feet on 08/26/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
